job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Position:
Data Scientist
Location:
Atlanta, GA (remote)
Job Description:
A42 Labs is a rapidly growing AI and ML startup in Atlanta, GA. We work with closely with clients all over the United States to change the way they work with data and artificial intelligence.
A42 Data Scientists work side-by-side our clients to build and deploy end-to-end artificial intelligence and machine learning solutions at scale.
If you enjoy working on high impact and challenging data problems that deliver value to clients, then we would like to hear from you.
Responsibilities:
Design and develop algorithms and models to use against large datasets
Apply data science techniques to diverse real-world problems on large and dynamic datasets
End-to-end data processing and modeling of large data sets
Working collaboratively with clients to develop and optimize models tailored to their data
Communicate analysis and model results to clients stakeholders
Educate technical and non-technical clients on analytics and data-driven decision making
30% - 70% travel annually
Required Skills:
2+ years Data Science experience
Experience building, training and testing machine learning models
Experience with end-to-end data pipelining and modeling
Experience with Python, R and/or SAS
Experience with Spark, Tensorflow, PyTorch type big data and ML/DL frameworks
Experience with common visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, Qlikview)
Capacity to quickly understand complex systems
Willingness to learn new technologies and an ability to effectively apply them
Strong communication skills
Bachelor's degree in related field e.g. Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics, Engineering
Desired Skills:
Master and/or PHD
Previous consulting experience
Exposure to the handling of large, diverse, real-world datasets
Knowledge of Spark, Greenplum and/or Hadoop
Exposure to Lean, Agile and Extreme Development practices
Experience with deep learning tools and packages (e.g. Tensorflow, PyTorch)
A42 Labs Offers:
Competitive salary
Pre IPO equity
Great health benefits
3 weeks paid vacation
Apple laptops
Startup culture
